result.arabic_text: ۞ وَيَسۡتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَۖ قُلۡ إِي وَرَبِّيٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
result.translation: 53. Nabiyow ku marak koros Qhiyaamah ayróh digaalá koo esserta, is nummannaa? Axcuk, Nabiyow keenik ixxic:yeey, inni Rabbil xiibita immay diggah is nummaay agaywaaga mali, isin Yallih digaalák yassaqqe mara hinniton.
